name: Grapple The Balloons
description:
Grapple Those Balloons

Use the Grapple to swing around collect the balloons.

----------------------------------------

It's a level of a possible Mini Game..

The level is a little tricky but is possible.

I have ideas for a couple of different types of levels but that'll take more time to incorporate...

----------------------------------------

Mini prototype game created for the 2D Grapple Gun Quest as part of GameDev.Tv "Unity Challenge Club" (as of March 20th in early access, closed Beta Testing )
